metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12495 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The quoteblock function in markdown.c in libmarkdown.a in DISCOUNT 2.2.3a allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12495` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

discount - 2.1.7-1+deb8u1build0.14.04.1
libmarkdown2 - 2.1.7-1+deb8u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: discount package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.7-1+deb8u1build0.14.04.1').
